review: Overall I am pretty satisfied with my purchase.  It is a speedy machine and I love the ability to use voice search.  I haven't bought a game controller yet as I have several other home consoles, but I may buy one in the future.  I would have given it a 5 out of 5 stars but I don't quite like the manner in which they provide access to Prime content.  It feels like I need to search more for movies and shows that I know are free with Amazon Prime.  The Amazon app on other platforms has an actual area that mainly includes the free content and it would be great if they did the same here.
author: Lloyd R. Milton "Lloyd R Milton Jr"
